0.1.3 (29.02.2008)
----------------

- showing package metadata for eggs
- some UI redesign
- rest2html integration for showing the Description as HTML 
  (still has some conversion issues)


0.1.2 (28.02.2008)
----------------

- updated documentation
- support for development distribution files
- some UI redesign
- new title property

0.1.1 (27.02.2008)
----------------

- initial release
